text: Amazing game, I bought the game on a whim and unlike many other JRPGs, I never got bored of it and finished it. It's just a fantastic game.

text: To me this song sums up my nostalgia towards Dark Cloud 2 perfectly.  Almost had to stop playing music because the joyful memories playing this game for hours hit me at once T_T

text: The catchiest tune for me is the save file jingle, but this stands out in my memory because of the Dark Cloud 1 style vocals. Closest thing to a third game we got was Rogue Galaxy.

text: Amazing game! How I wish they'd revisit this series.
author: Katesune

text: One of my favorite games of all time!! Dark Cloud 1 was such a lucky find for me when I was younger...but the 2nd game...such an improvement in every way. Sad to see the current state of this franchise - forgotten and left for dead. I don't give a shit about Ni No Kuni 2...give us Dark Cloud 3 already Level-5!!! It has been almost 15 years!
